Text: awesome job mate, is it possible for you to upload the rest of the season, cheers from down under, where we get none of these shows :P

I think this is the best show ever, but what's with the cencored dialog?  I'm pretty sure I watched this on Space with the swearing intact, and it is definitely uncencored when streaming on the Space website.  Oh well, thanks for the upload, I'll just have to pretend their following the script.  They're saying "stooge" instead of "douche", "hatch" instead of "ass" and "jock" instead of "cock".  I mean, who the fuck fucked it up?
